description.zh: 收录由上海 Web 团队研发的 AI 工具合集
description.en: A collection of AI tools developed by the Shanghai Web Team

zh: Web Team研发的各类工具
en: Various tools developed by Web Team

remarks.en: Please contact Web PM if you want to open permissions

description.zh: 一键将 Google Slides 中的文字翻译为其他语言
description.en: Translate text in Google Slides into other languages with one click

zh: 最新版本只需要安装插件，然后可以在google slides - extension里直接使用
en: The latest version only requires the installation of the plug-in
and can then be used directly in google slides - extension

remarks.zh: 推荐将原版文档另存一个副本再使用翻译功能
remarks.en: It is recommended to save a copy of the original document before using the translation function

description.zh: 支持带时间轴的 SRT 字幕文件一键翻译
description.en: Support one-click translation of SRT subtitle files with timeline

zh: 部署于本地 DIFY 服务器，仅限内网访问
字幕生成推荐使用剪映（需会员），中文识别准确度较高
建议翻译前由 GPT 进行“去水词”处理以提升质量
en: Deployed on a local DIFY server
It is recommended to use Jianying (membership required) for subtitle generation
which has a higher accuracy in Chinese recognition

remarks.zh:
功能更新中
建议总条数<1500条
remarks.en:
Function is being updated
The total number of recommended items is less than 1500

description.zh: 由SG Team开发的String文件翻译
description.en: String file translation developed by SG Team

zh: 支持多语言互译（如中译英
泰译中等）
en: Support multi-language translation (such as Chinese to English

name.zh: PPT口播稿生成+口播稿转语音工具
name.en: PPT script generation + script to speech tool

description.zh: 适用于本地化视频内容制作，提升效率
description.en: Applicable to localized video content production to improve efficiency

zh: 传 PDF 后自动生成 PPT 讲稿
可生成中英文语音播报
en: Automatically generate PPT presentation after uploading PDF
Can generate Chinese and English voice broadcast

description.zh: 可用于图片绘制/海报制作
description.en: Can be used for picture drawing/poster making

zh: 基于 GPT-Image 和 Flux (ComfuUI) 的 AI 图像处理工具
支持风格迁移
重绘
扩绘
en: AI image processing tool based on GPT-Image and Flux (ComfuUI)

name.en: One-click desensitization of sensitive PPT content

description.zh: 自动替换 PPT 中的敏感信息，并生成副本
description.en: Automatically replace sensitive information in PPT and generate a copy

description.zh:
公司内部知识库平台
可以将相关教材/课件放入知识库，搭建问答机器人
description.en: The company's internal knowledge base platform can put relevant teaching materials/courseware into the knowledge base and build a question-and-answer robot

remarks.zh: 目前知识库内容更新机制有待优化（只能是知识库管理员手动更新）
remarks.en: The current knowledge base content update mechanism needs to be optimized (it can only be updated manually by the knowledge base administrator)

description.zh: 基于Azure, ElevenLabs的AI音频生成平台
description.en: AI audio generation platform based on Azure, ElevenLabs

description.zh: AI 驱动的笔记整理与问答助手，支持围绕自定义资料生成学习内容和个性化辅导
description.en: AI-driven note-taking and Q&A assistant that supports generating learning content and personalized tutoring around custom materials

zh: 将课程讲义
项目文档或FAQ上传至 NotebookLM，系统会自动整理为结构化知识点并生成可对话的问答系统
适用于 课后自学
知识复习
en: project documents or FAQs to NotebookLM

remarks.zh: 公司员工均可使用（部分地区需要切换IP）
remarks.en: All company employees can use it (some areas need to switch IP)

description.zh: 由 Google Workspace 推出的 AI 视频创作工具，用于快速生成教学视频或培训内容
description.en: AI video creation tool launched by Google Workspace for quickly generating instructional videos or training content

zh: 仅需提供文案或课程要点，Google Vids 可自动生成教学脚本
视频结构
画面和配音建议，显著降低视频制作门槛
适合用于制作 微课（bite-size learning）
en: Just provide the copy or course highlights
Google Vids can automatically generate teaching scripts
